body:
Model: _GT-S5830C-i-M_

CPU: _Broadcom 21553 ARM11_

Arquitecture: _ARM1136JF-S_


![Rafael.Baugis Kernel](http://forum.xda-developers.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=1317642&stc=1&d=1347332090)


This Kernel version 2.6.35.7 is from Samsung sources, with GCC 4.4.7 compiled from sources, specific to arm1136jf-s.
I changed in sources for add more frequencies to cpu and configured to add features.
The kernel can be used on any rom.


### kernel features:
* vfat, ext2, ext3, ext4.
* swap, ramzswap and zRAM.
* cpu freq 156-312-624-832
* cpu auto undervolt on change cpu freq.
* cpu governors smartassV2, conservative, interactive, ondemand, userspace, powersave, bcm21553 and performance.
* IO schedulers noop, deadline, cfq, sio and bfq.
* iptables full needed rules.
* vpn support
* cifs support
* init.d - if not work check if the su and busybox location is /system/xbin/
* suport for bootanimation
* ClockWorkMOD Recovery v5.0.2.6


> ### How to Compile:
> 1. ### Install dependencies
> $ ./install_dep.sh

> 2. ### Configure and Compile
> $ ./Compile.sh

> 3. ### Create package
> $ ./Creat_package.sh

### Authors and Contributors
